item.title: BTI
item.description: score:276 Chances: The U.S. Supreme Court declined to hear R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company’s challenge to a voter-approved measure in California banning flavored tobacco products, providing stability to the company’s operations in the state. Investors may find opportunities in comeback stocks currently trading at no higher than 10% of their 52-week lows with a consensus view of at least moderate buy, presenting potential for recovery and growth.
